page.title: 16 Power Station
page.content:
This Power Station is in East Cowes and can be seen very clearly from the school. We visited the site on 16th July and saw Mr Fisher. Here are the questions that we asked him about the station.
1). How much Power do you use a day? {140 Megawatts 2). How many people do you employ? { 8 people work here 3). What sort of electricity do you produce? {Electricity is the same { everywhere. All power stations { feed the National Grid and { people take power from this { Grid. } 4). How old is the building? {It was started in 1978 and { finished in 1982 }
